CustomField.description: Formula to grab field from Account for displaying on Credit App object 01 - Credit App is needed 02 - Bill To setup needed 03 - Ship To setup needed 04 - National account - must be handled by NAM team, send email to that box 05 - Other - Email generated to both Rep and the credit group mailbox containing all the details
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 01 - Credit App is needed 02 - Bill To setup needed 03 - Ship To setup needed 04 - National account - must be handled by NAM team, send email to that box 05 - Other - Email generated to both Rep and the credit group mailbox containing all the details
CustomField.label: Credit - Action for Setup
